message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this incredible product. It's a game-changer in its industry, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to work with you. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $11500. How about we meet in the middle at $11250?

I understand you're still a bit above your target price, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11750. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a great deal for both of us. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still trying to save some money. How about we go back to your previous offer of $11500?

I'm surprised you're going back to my previous offer, Bob! I thought we were making progress. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11700. This is the absolute lowest I can go, and I think it's still a great deal for both of us. What do you think?
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still trying to save some money. I'm willing to meet you at $11500, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.

I understand you're trying to save some money, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $11700. I've already compromised a lot, and I think this is a fair price considering the product's value. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need you to meet me halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $11850. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not willing to go above $11500. This is my last offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
